name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Global Search Simulator: Perform Google Search in Any Country and Language

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Perform Google searches in any country and language with ease using our Search Simulator Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compare search results between two countries languages to optimize performance of your website worldwide!

Key Features-
- Perform Google searches in any country & language.
- Compare search results between any two countries & languages.
- Optimize performance of your website worldwide with easily!
